--- title: "Analysis of variance" --- ## Content - ANOVA and _F_-test statistic - Model assumptions ## Learning objectives At the end of the session, students should be capable of - carry-out a one-way analysis of variance test - check model assumptions using hypothesis tests and graphics. ## Readings - {{< fa book >}} Chapter 3 of the [Course notes](https://lbelzile.github.io/math80667a/03-completely_randomized_trials.html) ## Complementary readings - {{< fa book >}} Chapter 3 of @Maxwell.Delaney.Kelley:2017 (up to page 113). - {{< fa book >}} [Chapter 2](https://stat.ethz.ch/~meier/teaching/anova/completely-randomized-designs.html) of @Meier:2022 - {{< fa book >}} Chapter 3 and 7 of @Keppel/Wickens:2004. ## Slides

``` ::: ::: :::{.callout-tip} **Fun fact**: If you type ? (or shift + /) while going through the slides, you can see a list of slide-specific commands. ::: ## Code - [R script](/content/MATH80667A-03-content.R) - [SPSS script](/content/MATH80667A-03-content.sps) ## References
